name: Jack's Last Resort / playmaker game jam
name_original: Jack's Last Resort / playmaker game jam
description:
My entry for the 2018 Playmaker Game Jam. Its a FPS walking sim. All assets created by me with the following exceptions:

Tropix - music by Tozan, courtesy of OpenGameArt.org

Dock, Stand models by Ronkapaun, courtesy of OpenGameArt.org

radio model by Vethiel, courtesy of OpenGameArt.org

Syringe model by FacadeGaikor, courtesy of OpenGameArt.org
